name: Impossible Bunny Challenge
description:
Impossible Bunny Challenge is a fun and free game that lets you surf the wind as a Bunny and race against three other Bunnies to collect checkpoint balls. The game features a tough racing AI that learned how to win by itself using machine learning. It is intentionally harder to control your Bunny, so you’ll have to learn quickly to beat the competition at their own game.

You can also customize the Bunnies trail effects for extra fun. Choose from different range of effects to make your Bunny stand out from the crowd.
Or just sit back and watch the action in spectator mode from a total of 3 levels including the Moon.
Best played with your own music playing in the background!

Can you master your Bunny's controls to beat the Impossible Bunny Challenge?
Download the game for free today and see if you can outrace the smartest, fastest, & cutest wind surfing Bunnies in the world!
